children.summary: One friend reports feeling weak and not fine, while the other is fine.
Regular physical exercise is crucial for staying fit and avoiding idleness.

children.topic: Consequences of Lack of Physical Exercise
children.summary: Not taking physical exercise regularly can lead to poor health and inability to perform daily tasks.
A balanced diet, with the right proportion of necessary ingredients, is essential for overall well-being.
A balanced diet means taking regular food that contains all necessary ingredients needed for health in right proportion.
The friend suggests taking physical exercise regularly and eating a balanced diet to stay fit and healthy.
The friends encourage each other to follow the advice and take care of their health.
